trans-unit.target: 這個範例會傳回`C:\Dir1\Dir2\Dir4\Dir5\File.txt`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="baseDirectory" /> or <paramref name="relativePath" /> are malformed paths.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="baseDirectory" /> 或 <paramref name="relativePath" /> 是格式不正確的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Controls the ability to access files and folders.
trans-unit.target: 控制存取檔案和資料夾的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of a directory to another directory.
trans-unit.target: 將目錄內容複製到另一個目錄。

trans-unit.source: The directory to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的目錄。

trans-unit.source: The location to which the directory contents should be copied.
trans-unit.target: 要複製目錄內容的目標位置。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of a directory to another directory.
trans-unit.target: 將目錄內容複製到另一個目錄。

trans-unit.source: This method copies the contents of the source directory to the target directory.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將來源目錄的內容複製到目標目錄。

trans-unit.source: If the target directory does not exist, it is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果目標目錄不存在，則會建立它。

trans-unit.source: If a directory with the same name exists in the target location, the contents of the two directories are merged.
trans-unit.target: 如果具有相同名稱的目錄存在於目標位置，則會合併兩個目錄的內容。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a new name for the directory during the operation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在作業期間指定目錄的新名稱。

trans-unit.source: When copying files within a directory, exceptions may be thrown that are caused by a specific file.
trans-unit.target: 目錄中的檔案複製時，例外狀況可能擲回造成特定的檔案。

trans-unit.source: When such exceptions are thrown, they are consolidated into a single exception whose `Data` property holds entries in the form of an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> in which the file or directory path is the key and the specific exception message is contained in the corresponding value.
trans-unit.target: 這類例外狀況會擲回時，會將它們合併成單一的例外狀況的`Data`屬性會保留項目中的表單<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>所在的檔案或目錄路徑是索引鍵和特定的例外狀況訊息會包含在對應的值。

trans-unit.source: Use `For…Each` to enumerate through the entries.
trans-unit.target: 使用`For…Each`列舉項目。

trans-unit.source: Copy a directory
trans-unit.target: 複製目錄

trans-unit.source: [How to: Copy a Directory to Another Directory in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-copy-a-directory-to-another-directory.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何： 將目錄複製到另一個目錄，在 Visual Basic 中](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-copy-a-directory-to-another-directory.md)

trans-unit.source: The following example copies the contents of directory `TestDirectory1` into `TestDirectory2`, overwriting existing files.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會複製目錄的內容`TestDirectory1`到`TestDirectory2`，覆寫現有檔案。

trans-unit.source: Replace `C:\TestDirectory1` and `C:\TestDirectory2` with the path and name of the directory you wish to copy and the location to which you wish to copy it.
trans-unit.target: 取代`C:\TestDirectory1`和`C:\TestDirectory2`的路徑和名稱，您想要複製的目錄以及您要複製的位置。

trans-unit.source: The path is not valid for one of the following reasons: it is a zero-length string; it contains only white space; it contains invalid characters; or it is a device path (starts with \\\\.\\).
trans-unit.target: 因下列其中一項原因而導致路徑無效：它是長度為零的字串、它只包含空白字元、它包含無效的字元，或者它是裝置路徑 (開頭為 \\\\.\\)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="destinationDirectoryName" /> or <paramref name="sourceDirectoryName" /> is <see langword="Nothing" /> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationDirectoryName" /> 或 <paramref name="sourceDirectoryName" /> 為 <see langword="Nothing" /> 或空字串。

trans-unit.source: The source directory does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 來源目錄不存在。

trans-unit.source: The source path and target path are the same.
trans-unit.target: 來源路徑和目標路徑相同。

trans-unit.source: The operation is cyclic.
trans-unit.target: 作業是循環的。

trans-unit.source: The path exceeds the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 路徑超過系統定義的最大長度。

trans-unit.source: A folder name in the path contains a colon (:) or is in an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: 路徑中的資料夾名稱含有冒號 (:)，或者是無效的格式。

trans-unit.source: The user lacks necessary permissions to view the path.
trans-unit.target: 使用者缺乏必要的使用權限來檢視路徑。

trans-unit.source: A destination file exists but cannot be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 目的檔案存在，但無法存取它。

trans-unit.source: Controls the ability to access files and folders.
trans-unit.target: 控制存取檔案和資料夾的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />。

trans-unit.source: Default is <see langword="UIOption.OnlyErrorDialogs" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 <see langword="UIOption.OnlyErrorDialogs" />。

trans-unit.source: When such exceptions are thrown, they are consolidated into a single exception whose `Data` property holds entries in the form of an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> in which the file or directory path is the key and the specific exception message is contained in the corresponding value.

trans-unit.source: Use `For…Each` to enumerate through the entries.
trans-unit.target: 使用`For…Each`列舉項目。

trans-unit.source: Copies the contents of a directory to another directory.

trans-unit.source: This method copies the contents of the source directory to the target directory.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將來源目錄的內容複製到目標目錄。

trans-unit.source: If the target directory does not exist, it is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果目標目錄不存在，則會建立它。

trans-unit.source: If a directory with the same name exists in the target location, the contents of the two directories are merged.
trans-unit.target: 如果具有相同名稱的目錄存在於目標位置，則會合併兩個目錄的內容。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a new name for the directory during the operation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在作業期間指定目錄的新名稱。

trans-unit.source: When copying files within a directory, exceptions may be thrown that are caused by a specific file, such as a file existing during a merge while `overwrite` is set to `False`.
trans-unit.target: 目錄中的檔案複製時，例外狀況可能擲回造成特定的檔案，例如檔案時合併過程`overwrite`設`False`。

trans-unit.source: When such exceptions are thrown, they are consolidated into a single exception whose `Data` property holds entries in the form of an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> in which the file or directory path is the key and the specific exception message is contained in the corresponding value.

trans-unit.source: Use `For…Each` to enumerate through the entries.
trans-unit.target: 使用`For…Each`列舉項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.DriveInfo> class models a drive and provides methods and properties to query for drive information.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.IO.DriveInfo> to determine what drives are available, and what type of drives they are.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.DriveInfo>來判斷哪些磁碟機可用，而且它們是哪種類型的磁碟機。

trans-unit.source: You can also query the property to determine the capacity and available free space on the drive.

trans-unit.source: Moves a directory from one location to another.
trans-unit.target: 將目錄從某個位置移至另一個位置。

trans-unit.source: If an attempt is made to move a directory inside a directory that does not exist, the target structure will be created.

trans-unit.source: This example moves `Directory1` inside `Directory2`, overwriting the directory if it already exists.
trans-unit.target: 本範例將`Directory1`內`Directory2`，覆寫目錄，如果已經存在。

trans-unit.source: The path is not valid for one of the following reasons: it is a zero-length string; it contains only white space; it contains invalid characters; or it is a device path (starts with \\\\.\\).
trans-unit.target: 因下列其中一項原因而導致路徑無效：它是長度為零的字串、它只包含空白字元、它包含無效的字元，或者它是裝置路徑 (開頭為 \\\\.\\)。

trans-unit.source: The operation is cyclic.

trans-unit.source: Moves a file to a new location.
trans-unit.target: 將檔案移至新的位置。

trans-unit.source: Path of the file to be moved.
trans-unit.target: 要移動的檔案其路徑。

trans-unit.source: Path of the directory into which the file should be moved.
trans-unit.target: 要移入檔案之目錄的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Moves a file to a new location.
trans-unit.target: 將檔案移至新的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the target structure does not exist, it is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果目標結構不存在，則會建立它。

trans-unit.source: The `MoveFile` method preserves ACEs (Access Control Entries) only when moving the file within the same volume.
trans-unit.target: `MoveFile`方法會保留 Ace （存取控制項目），只有當移動相同的磁碟區中的檔案。

trans-unit.source: This includes inherited ACEs, which become direct ACEs when moved (direct ACEs take precedence over inherited ACEs).
trans-unit.target: 這包括繼承的 Ace，變成直接 Ace 時移動 （直接 Ace 的優先順序高於繼承 Ace）。

trans-unit.source: If a file is moved between volumes, ACEs will not be copied.
trans-unit.target: 如果磁碟區之間移動檔案，將不會複製 Ace。

trans-unit.source: Path of the file to be moved.
trans-unit.target: 要移動的檔案其路徑。

trans-unit.source: Path of the directory into which the file should be moved.
trans-unit.target: 要移入檔案之目錄的路徑。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> to overwrite existing files; otherwise <see langword="False" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫現有檔案，則為 <see langword="True" />，否則為 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: Default is <see langword="False" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: Moves a file to a new location.
trans-unit.target: 將檔案移至新的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the target structure does not exist, it is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果目標結構不存在，則會建立它。

trans-unit.source: The `MoveFile` method preserves ACEs (Access Control Entries) only when moving the file within the same volume.
trans-unit.target: `MoveFile`方法會保留 Ace （存取控制項目），只有當移動相同的磁碟區中的檔案。

trans-unit.source: This includes inherited ACEs, which become direct ACEs when moved (direct ACEs take precedence over inherited ACEs).
trans-unit.target: 這包括繼承的 Ace，變成直接 Ace 時移動 （直接 Ace 的優先順序高於繼承 Ace）。

trans-unit.source: If a file is moved between volumes, ACEs will not be copied.
trans-unit.target: 如果磁碟區之間移動檔案，將不會複製 Ace。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="OpenTextFieldParser" /> method allows you to create a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.TextFieldParser" /> object, which provides a way to easily and efficiently parse structured text files, such as logs.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="OpenTextFieldParser" /> 方法能讓您建立 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.TextFieldParser" /> 物牛，而這個物件有助於輕鬆有效率地剖析結構化文字檔 (例如記錄檔)。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="TextFieldParser" /> object can be used to read both delimited and fixed-width files.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 <see langword="TextFieldParser" /> 物件，讀取分隔的和固定寬度的檔案。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> to append to the file contents; <see langword="False" /> to overwrite the file contents.

trans-unit.source: Writes data to a binary file.
trans-unit.target: 將資料寫入二進位檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the specified path, excluding the file name, is not valid, a <xref:System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException> exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的路徑，但不包括檔案名稱，不是有效的<xref:System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the path is valid but the file does not exist, the file is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果此路徑有效，但檔案不存在，則會建立檔案。

trans-unit.source: The `WriteAllBytes` method opens a file, writes to it, and then closes it.
trans-unit.target: `WriteAllBytes`方法開啟的檔案、 寫入，，然後關閉它。

trans-unit.source: Code that uses the `WriteAllBytes` method is simpler than code that uses a <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用程式碼`WriteAllBytes`方法是使用程式碼，比簡單<xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>物件。

trans-unit.source: However, if you are adding data to a file using a loop, a <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter> object can provide better performance because you only have to open and close the file once.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您將資料加入至檔案，使用迴圈，<xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>物件可提供更佳的效能，因為您只需要開啟和關閉檔案一次。

trans-unit.source: Write to a binary file
trans-unit.target: 寫入至二進位檔案

trans-unit.source: [How to: Write to Binary Files in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-to-binary-files.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何： 寫入二進位檔案，在 Visual Basic 中](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-to-binary-files.md)

trans-unit.source: This example appends the data array `CustomerData` to the file `CollectedData`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會將附加的資料陣列`CustomerData`檔案`CollectedData`。

trans-unit.source: The path is not valid for one of the following reasons: it is a zero-length string; it contains only white space; it contains invalid characters; or it is a device path (starts with \\\\.\\); it ends with a trailing slash.
trans-unit.target: 因下列其中一項原因而導致路徑無效：它是長度為零的字串、它只包含空白字元、它包含無效的字元、它是裝置路徑 (開頭為 \\\\.\\)，或者它的結尾含有斜線。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="file" /> is <see langword="Nothing" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="file" /> 為 <see langword="Nothing" />。

trans-unit.source: The file does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 檔案不存在。

trans-unit.source: The file is in use by another process, or an I/O error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 檔案正由另一個程序使用中，或發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The path exceeds the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 路徑超過系統定義的最大長度。

trans-unit.source: A file or directory name in the path contains a colon (:) or is in an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: 路徑中的檔案或目錄名稱含有冒號 (:)，或者是無效的格式。

trans-unit.source: There is not enough memory to write the string to buffer.
trans-unit.target: 沒有足夠的記憶體可將字串寫入緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The user lacks necessary permissions to view the path.
trans-unit.target: 使用者缺乏必要的使用權限來檢視路徑。

trans-unit.source: Controls the ability to access files and folders.
trans-unit.target: 控制存取檔案和資料夾的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes text to a file.
trans-unit.target: 將文字寫入檔案。

trans-unit.source: File to be written to.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Text to be written to file.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入檔案的文字。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> to append to the contents of the file; <see langword="False" /> to overwrite the contents of the file.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> 表示要將內容附加到檔案，<see langword="False" /> 表示要覆寫檔案的內容。

trans-unit.source: Writes text to a file.
trans-unit.target: 將文字寫入檔案。

trans-unit.source: The UTF-8 encoding is used to write to the file.
trans-unit.target: Utf-8 編碼方式，用來寫入檔案。

trans-unit.source: To specify a different encoding, use a different overload of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem.WriteAllText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定不同的編碼方式，使用不同的多載的<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem.WriteAllText%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the specified file does not exist, it is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的檔案不存在，則會建立該檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the specified encoding does not match the existing encoding of the file, the specified coding is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的編碼不符合現有檔案的編碼，則會忽略指定的編碼。

trans-unit.source: The `WriteAllText` method opens a file, writes to it, and then closes it.
trans-unit.target: `WriteAllText`方法開啟的檔案、 寫入，，然後關閉它。

trans-unit.source: Code that uses the `WriteAllText` method is simpler than code that uses a <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用程式碼`WriteAllText`方法是使用程式碼，比簡單<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>物件。

trans-unit.source: However, if you are adding strings to a file by using a loop, a <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter> object can provide better performance because you only have to open and close the file one time.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果利用迴圈，將字串加入至檔案<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>物件可提供更佳的效能，因為您只需要開啟和關閉檔案一次。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem.OpenTextFileWriter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.FileSystem.OpenTextFileWriter%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.WriteAllText` method.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出包含工作的範例`My.Computer.FileSystem.WriteAllText`方法。

trans-unit.source: Write text to a file
trans-unit.target: 將文字寫入檔案中

trans-unit.source: [How to: Write Text to Files in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-text-to-files.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何： 將文字寫入至 Visual Basic 中的檔案](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-write-text-to-files.md)

trans-unit.source: Append text to a file
trans-unit.target: 將文字附加至檔案

trans-unit.source: [How to: Append to Text Files in Visual Basic](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-append-to-text-files.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何： 附加至在 Visual Basic 中的文字檔](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-append-to-text-files.md)

trans-unit.source: This example writes the line `"This is new text to be added."` to the file `Test.txt`, overwriting any existing text in the file.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會將行寫入`"This is new text to be added."`檔案`Test.txt`，覆寫任何現有的文字檔案中。

trans-unit.source: This example writes the names of the files in the `Documents and Settings` folder to `FileList.txt`, inserting a carriage return between each for better readability.
trans-unit.target: 此範例撰寫中的檔案名稱`Documents and Settings`資料夾`FileList.txt`，插入換行字元傳回之間應提高可讀性。
